d5ba4e5f-114b-4d71-bf7e-e73405a90cf9.description: The course objective is to provide the basic skills necessary for an immigration services officer to effectively administrate immigration benefit program by adjudicating routine immigration benefits.
d5ba4e5f-114b-4d71-bf7e-e73405a90cf9.name: Immigration Services Officer Basic Training Course (BASIC)

issuer.summary: issued by United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

entity.name: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

badge_template_activities.title: The methods of assessment include written papers, examinations, quizzes, performance rubrics/checklists, with a minimum passing score of 70%.
Instructional strategies include: audio visual materials, case studies, laboratory, discussion, computer-based training, practical exercises, learner presentations, lectures, classroom exercise.

d696c7ed-19fa-41a1-abce-79d9eb47c41b.description: The course objective is for ISO-2s to gain additional competence in research methods, identifying fraud and completing fraud referrals, and writing legally sufficient adjudicative decisions.
d696c7ed-19fa-41a1-abce-79d9eb47c41b.name: Immigration Services Officer Skill Builder Program

issuer.summary: issued by United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

entity.name: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

badge_template_activities.title: The methods of assessment include written papers, examinations, performance rubrics/checklists, with a minimum passing score of 70%.
Instructional strategies include: audio visual materials, case studies, laboratory, discussion, computer-based training, practical exercises, lectures, classroom exercise.

815093fe-f2de-4fb0-be14-280c0b3562e2.description: The course objective is to provide newly hired Refugee Officers (and other staff throughout USCIS who will be adjudicating Refugee applications) with three weeks of specialized instruction for refugee adjudications. Instructors teach and test trainees using a comprehensive, carefully designed curriculum with a focus on refugee law, interviewing techniques, analysis, and procedures.
815093fe-f2de-4fb0-be14-280c0b3562e2.name: Refugee Affairs Division Officer Training Course (RDOTC) and In-Field Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

entity.name: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

badge_template_activities.title: The methods of assessment include case studies, written papers, examinations, presentations, quizzes, performance rubrics/checklists, with a minimum passing score of 70%.
Instructional strategies include: audio visual materials, case studies, laboratory, discussion, practical exercises, learner presentations, lectures, classroom exercise.

1c900ea2-b1b7-4cc4-9f79-4137615a0053.description: The course objective is to provide a foundational training that teaches new RAIO officers the laws, policies, interviewing techniques, analytical and decision-making skills relevant to the core adjudications of all RAIO divisions. It focuses on the domestic and international legal underpinnings of the U.S. refugee protection system, as well as the procedures and adjudication skills common to all RAIO divisions.
1c900ea2-b1b7-4cc4-9f79-4137615a0053.name: Refugee, Asylum, and International Operations Directorate Combined Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

entity.name: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

badge_template_activities.title: The methods of assessment include written papers, examinations, quizzes, performance rubrics/checklists, with a minimum passing score of 70%.
Instructional strategies include: audio visual materials, case studies, laboratory, discussion, computer-based training, practical exercises, learner presentations, lectures, classroom exercise.

bcadf9ae-5e3b-4bc3-a7a2-928524bdd4c1.description: The course provide an overview of the Instructional Systems Design (ISD) process: determining the state and needs of the learner, defining the end goal of instruction, and creating an effective intervention to assist in the transition. Subjects include: adult learning theory and the ADDIE ISD model, performance analysis, developing training objectives, incorporating activities and visual metaphors, and design evaluation strategies to assess the effectiveness of the instructional experience.
bcadf9ae-5e3b-4bc3-a7a2-928524bdd4c1.name: Training Professionals Development Course
